Package vendingmachine

Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
vendingmachine.RegularVendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
The RegularVendingMachine class represents a regular vending machine created by the vending machine factory. It contains attributes associated with both its vending features and maintenance features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegularVendingMachine(int slotCapacity)
    Creates a regular vending machine with slots for 8 different items.
